reviewText: The quickest way to learn about how to stay healthy and/or how to regain your health. The information presented in the DVD is well presented and easy to understand.  Good to show your friends and relatives.  Spend an hour viewing the DVD and save you from a life of chronic illness, expenses, stress, trips to the doctors, and taking prescription drugs which could result in more ailments. The quickest way to grab on important information.  Then buy the book, also by Brenda Watson.
Does not explain the HOPE formula.  I guess that's in a different product.  She's a terrible narrator.  I  would assume she's well versed in the subject, but doesn't sound like it.
I have had IBS since I was young and have had pain here and there. I love the information on this video and actually have let a few friends borrow it. I highly recommend it!
